00041 int32_t Protocol::response_code(Event *event) {
00042   if (event->type == Event::ERROR)
00043     return event->error;
00044 
00045   const uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00046   size_t remaining = event->message_len;
00047 
00048   try { return decode_i32(&msg, &remaining); }
00049   catch (Exception &e) { return e.code(); }
00050 }

00057 String Protocol::string_format_message(Event *event) {
00058   int error = 0;
00059   const uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00060   size_t remaining = event->message_len;
00061 
00062   if (event == 0)
00063     return String("NULL event");
00064 
00065   if (event->type != Event::MESSAGE)
00066     return event->to_str();
00067 
00068   try {
00069     error = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00070 
00071     if (error == Error::OK)
00072       return Error::get_text(error);
00073 
00074     uint16_t len;
00075     const char *str = decode_str16(&msg, &remaining, &len);
00076 
00077     return String(str, len > 150 ? 150 : len);
00078   }
00079   catch (Exception &e) {
00080     return format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00081   }
00082 }

00089 CommBuf *
00090 Protocol::create_error_message(HeaderBuilder &hbuilder, int error,
00091                                const char *msg) {
00092   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 4 + encoded_length_str16(msg));
00093   cbuf->append_i32(error);
00094   cbuf->append_str16(msg);
00095   return cbuf;
00096 }
